subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: An American man was not in the top 10 of the A.T.P.’s computer rankings this week, the first time that has happened since the rankings were introduced in 1973.
snippet: An American man was not in the top 10 of the A.T.P.’s computer rankings this week, the first time that has happened since the rankings were introduced in 1973.
